backgroundInformationList.description: Advisory Regarding Notice of Public Meetings and Complete Applications

noticeDescription:
ADVISORY RE: NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING

AND COMPLETE APPLICATIONS

 

You are receiving this advisory because you are entitled to, or have requested to be provided, public notice of planning matters in accordance with the Planning Act, R.S.O. 1990 and its regulations, by the City of Toronto City Clerk’s Office.

 

The City Clerk’s Office relies on Canada Post in order to give you notice by ordinary mail.

 

Please be advised that in the event of a Canada Post labour disruption, all Notices of Public Meeting and Complete Application will be published in the Toronto Star and made available at https://www.toronto.ca/city-government/public-notices-bylaws/. 

 

We strongly encourage you to contact our office at RegistarCCO@toronto.ca or 416-394-8101 to update your contact information with an email address, in order to receive public notices electronically.
title: Advisory Regarding Notice of Public Meetings and Complete Applications
